description: This simple little trick can turn a luscious fruit salad into something far more special.
keywords: Fruit pudding,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Summer Fruits With Easy “brulee” Topping Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 tbs soft light brown sugar (plus extra, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Make a fruit salad by cutting the fruit into similar-sized chunks, about 1cm, or the same size as your smallest fruit, discarding the peach stones, if using. Mix in 1 tbs of the caster sugar and leave to macerate, at room temperature, for 1 hour.
Whisk together the cream and remaining caster sugar until it is thick. Gently fold in the Greek yoghurt and vanilla extract until well combined and chill until needed.

When the fruit is ready, spread it out in a large shallow bowl and cover it with a thick layer of the whipped cream mixture. Sprinkle over the brown sugar as evenly as possibly, until there is a thin, even layer all over the cream, and you cannot see it underneath. You may need a little more sugar, depending on the diamater of your serving bowl.
Chill the fruit salad in the fridge for 30 minutes, until the sugar has dissolved and there are no granules left.
